meanings.sent1: The forbidder told us we couldn't play outside.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is the forbidder of using phones in class.
meanings.sent3: The forbidder of sweets found a hidden stash of candy in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The strict parent was the forbidder of all fun activities.
meanings.sent5: The forbidder of secrets always knew when someone was hiding something.

meanings.definition: To command someone not to do something.
meanings.sent1: Please forbidder your brother from eating all the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The sign on the door forbiddered entry without permission.
meanings.sent3: She forbiddered her dog from jumping on the couch, but he did it anyway.
meanings.sent4: The king forbiddered anyone from speaking of the forbidden forest.
meanings.sent5: The doctor forbiddered the patient from eating spicy foods after the surgery.
